colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @027B (CES BLA MA YI DAM BSRUNG MA'I TSOGS MA'I TSOGS LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL 'DI CHO GA MCHOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DAD STOBS LDAN PA RDZONG DKAR BZHUGS RGYAL BRTZEGS CHOS MDZAD KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN PA, DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG SKYE 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
